    Subclasses of BDD in org.ants.javandd
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    NDDFactory.bdd
    wrap NDD node as BDD for factory
    Classes in org.ants.javandd that implement interfaces with type arguments of type BDD
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static class 
    BDD.BDDIterator
    BDDIterator is used to iterate through the satisfying assignments of a BDD.

    BDD.transform(BDD rel, BDDPairing pair)
    Shorthand for this.applyEx(rel, BDDFactory.and, vars).replace(pair), where vars is a varset BDD representation of the codomain of pair if pair maps variable V1 to V2, then LEVEL(V1) == LEVEL(V2)+1
    BDD
    NDDFactory.bdd.transform(BDD rel, BDDPairing pair)
    Shorthand for this.applyEx(rel, BDDFactory.and, vars).replace(pair), where vars is a varset BDD representation of the codomain of pair if pair maps variable V1 to V2, then LEVEL(V1) == LEVEL(V2)+1

    BDD.transform(BDD rel, BDDPairing pair)
    Shorthand for this.applyEx(rel, BDDFactory.and, vars).replace(pair), where vars is a varset BDD representation of the codomain of pair if pair maps variable V1 to V2, then LEVEL(V1) == LEVEL(V2)+1
    BDD
